block.mekanism.metallurgic_infuser.tip: §ePut redstone in energy slot for some energy
advancement.create101.final.desc: You have won this pack, congrats!
create101.tip.bee: Point to a bee and you can see what pollens it has
create101.tip.oregen: In world of Create 101, Only iron ore, redstone ore, quartz ore and ancient debris will be naturally generated
create101.tip.credit: Blockzapper and rope pulley can break bedrock is fixed by Snownee
create101.tip.jei: Always check JEI, Jungle sapling, blaze powder, wither skull and many items have had a recipe now!
create101.tip.coco: Destroying jungle leaves may drop cocoa beans
create101.tip.backpack: Looking for a backpack? Personal chest is a good choice
create101.tip.peaceful_star: In peaceful mode, building the structure to summon the wither will drop nether star directly
create101.tip.sol: Keeping a diverse diet can get many benefits
create101.tip.wither_immune: Reactor glass and fusion reactor frame is immune to wither
create101.tip.everpotion: You can make your everpotion core! Press R you can open the UI
create101.tip.calc: You can use crafting calculator to view every step of making the mysterious triangle. You can import preset recipes!
create101.tip.kelp: Want to make belt but can't find kelp? You can craft a kelp now!
create101.tip.explosion: There are more than one way to create explosion
create101.tip.sound: Wool can block noise transmission to a certain extent
create101.tip.ore: If the pot is placed on the belt, only the first item can be harvested. The solution is to place a buffer container instead
create101.tip.pump: If you want to automate the Triangle, building a 10,000 blocks chocolate lake could be a more economical choice
create101.tip.coil: Making antimatter is too slow? You can place many supercharged coils on the SPS structure
create101.tip.cc: It doesn't matter to play this pack if you don't know how to ComputerCraft!
create101.tip.farm: Planting crops alternately, the efficiency is greatly improved!
create101.tip.rich_soil: The rich soil farmland can speed up growth, and cannot be trampled
create101.tip.joy: Also try horse breeding and cooking!
create101.tip.no_ai: Due to performance considerations, snow golem's AI and physics are removed
create101.tip.snow: Snow golem won't generate snow layer in warm biomes
create101.tip.piglin: Infinite gold means you can trade with piglin infinite times
create101.tip.shears: Use shears on snow golem, you can get the pumpkin back
create101.tip.energy: You can put redstone in infuser's energy slot to get startup energy
create101.tip.bead: Right clicking the Soul Bead will lead you to the nearest Nether Fortress
